tools.title: Gen Alpha Audience Insights
tools.description: Explore the youngest, most digitally immersed generation to uncover trends in values, behaviors, and future consumer expectations. This GPT provides insights into how Gen Alpha shapes the next wave of technology, education, and media consumption.

tools.title: Gen Z Audience Insights
tools.description: Dive deep into the priorities and habits of Gen Z, a generation driven by authenticity and social impact. Gain insights into their values, media preferences, and purchasing behaviors to better connect with this influential audience.

tools.title: Multicultural Audience Insights
tools.description: Access targeted knowledge on Black, Hispanic, and Asian American consumers. This GPT uncovers key cultural nuances, trends, and purchasing drivers to help understand how to reach and engage with this audience effectively.

tools.title: Millennial Audience Insights
tools.description: Access targeted insights to engage and understand Millennials. This GPT explores generational trends, values, media & news consumption, and behaviors, offering actionable strategies for authentic, purpose-driven connections.

tools.title: Gen X Audience Insights
tools.description: Get targeted insights into Gen X, focusing on their digital habits, financial priorities, and cultural values. This GPT helps marketers and researchers connect with this influential generation by leveraging their unique traits of independence, loyalty, and practical decision-making.

tools.title: CEO Audience Insights
tools.description: This GPT leverages proprietary research and executive behavior data to deliver strategic insights into CEO priorities, media engagement, and leadership trends. It helps users navigate CEO decision-making, anticipate emerging narratives, and align messaging with business and geopolitical shifts.

tools.title: CIO Audience Insights
tools.description: Gain strategic insights into technology leadership with this GPT. It highlights key transformation priorities, challenges, and opportunities shaping the agendas of Chief Information Officers in a rapidly evolving tech landscape.

tools.title: CISO Audience Insights
tools.description: Navigate the important issue of cybersecurity with insights into the priorities and pain points of Chief Information Security Officers. This GPT sheds light on risk management, emerging threats, and strategic opportunities for understanding what's top of mind for CISOs.

tools.title: ITDM Audience Insights
tools.description: Analyze the decision-making processes of IT buyers to understand what drives technology investments. This GPT helps uncover key purchasing factors, market trends, and pain points in the IT buying journey.

tools.title: CMO Audience Insights
tools.description: Gain strategic insights into CMO priorities and behaviors for 2025. This GPT specializes in uncovering actionable trends in marketing technology, customer engagement, and brand strategy.

tools.title: DE&I Trends & Insights 2025
tools.description: Understand the financial and cultural impacts of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DE&I). This GPT explores the implications of companies scaling back DE&I initiatives, linking to business outcomes like innovation, employee engagement, and financial performance.

tools.title: Clean Energy Trends & Predictions
tools.description: Get data-driven insights into the global energy transition, focusing on renewable energy growth, technological innovation, and policy trends. It provides actionable guidance to stakeholders on addressing barriers and leveraging opportunities to align with 2025 decarbonization goals.

tools.title: Retail Banking & Consumer Payments
tools.description: Get data-driven insights into consumer payment behavior and adoption trends, focusing on emerging technologies, demographic patterns, and market innovations. It provides actionable guidance for researchers and analysts to understand shifting consumer preferences and identify growth opportunities in the evolving financial landscape.

tools.title: Workplace & Employee Engagement Insights 2025
tools.description: Get actionable insights into workplace and employee engagement trends for 2024 and 2025. This GPT synthesizes reputable research to help leaders understand priorities like employee well-being, AI's workplace role, and leadership's impact on culture.

tools.title: Media Trends for 2025
tools.description: This GPT uses real readership data to provide insights into media trends, CEO leadership, and industry readership. It helps users understand media bias, crisis management, and executive reputation while predicting emerging business and political narratives.

tools.title: TikTok Trends, Insights & Usage
tools.description: Get data-driven insights into TikTok's consumer trends, platform evolution, and its role in shaping digital culture. This GPT offers strategic guidance for leveraging TikTok's features, audience dynamics, and marketing opportunities to stay ahead in the social media landscape.

tools.title: Global Digital Media Trends 2025
tools.description: Get actionable insights into global digital media consumption trends, user preferences, and emerging technologies shaping platform engagement. This tool aids researchers and strategists in analyzing regional patterns, identifying new opportunities, and crafting data-driven strategies to navigate the evolving digital landscape.

tools.title: Digital & Creator Marketing Trends 2025
tools.description: Get actionable insights into digital and creator marketing trends for 2025. This GPT synthesizes data on consumer behaviors, emerging technologies, media innovations, and creator marketing trends.

tools.title: TikTok Trends
tools.description: This GPT uses real-time TikTok data to deliver actionable insights into trending hashtags, content formats, and audience behavior. It helps creators, marketers, and brands uncover viral opportunities, craft high-performing content strategies, and stay ahead of cultural trends while identifying emerging patterns in platform engagement and niche communities.

tools.title: Smart Brevity Assistant
tools.description: This GPT transforms raw content into Smart Brevity format—prioritizing clarity, brevity, and impact. It helps users streamline communication for emails, reports, and social posts by highlighting key takeaways, cutting fluff, and enhancing engagement.

tools.title: Travel & Tourism Insights
tools.description: This GPT provides strategic insights into evolving travel and tourism trends, with a focus on U.S. travelers and island destinations. It analyzes traveler motivations, demographic shifts, booking behaviors, and sustainability expectations to help brands tailor experiences, optimize campaigns, and stay ahead of industry changes.

tools.title: Private Wealth Insights
tools.description: This GPT uses proprietary HNWI research and audience data to uncover wealth trends, investment behavior, and lifestyle patterns among affluent Americans. It helps brands and financial institutions anticipate market shifts, tailor engagement strategies, and address the evolving expectations of high-net-worth clients.

tools.title: Google News Media Coverage
tools.description: This GPT analyzes real-time news coverage to uncover trends in executive leadership, company reputation, and industry narratives. It helps users track key people and organizations, understand media sentiment, and identify emerging business or political storylines.

tools.title: AI Prompt Library
tools.description: A comprehensive collection of AI prompts for various use cases and GPT interactions.

tools.title: Zeno AI Hive
tools.description: This presentation showcases how to use the AI Hive and use cases.

tools.title: AI Hive Prompts
tools.description: A list of prompts that can be used with the AI Hive or any custom GPT.

tools.title: Understanding Small Business Globally
tools.description: This GPT is designed to help users analyze and understand regional differences in small business culture and terminology across France, Germany, the UK, India, Japan, and Brazil. It uses the uploaded reference document to answer questions about how the concept of "small business" is perceived in these regions and what alternative terms or ideas might be more appropriate.

tools.title: Using AI in Client Work
tools.description: Best practice for disclosing AI use to a client is in the SOW. Below, we have language recommendations for the most common types of AI Usage in SOWs.

tools.title: AI Copilot Training
tools.description: Copilot is an AI-powered web chat for work that allows organizations to unlock the benefits of generative AI today, such as better answers, greater efficiency, and new ways to be creative.

tools.title: ChatGPT 201: Writing Prompts and Building Custom GPTs
tools.description: Take your AI capability further with ChatGPT 201—built specifically for Edelman talent looking to deepen their impact through smarter prompt writing and custom GPT creation. This self-paced course is designed for colleagues across specialties—from earned media and brand strategy to research, analytics, and production—who want to streamline internal workflows, boost creative efficiency, and bring greater precision to client work using generative AI.

tools.title: AI 101: Compliance - DJEH
tools.description: Our mission is to transform DJEH into an AI-enabled enterprise, delivering new proprietary value at scale to our clients, empowering us to dominate the global communications landscape, and guiding the industry back to sustainable growth. Our goal is to infuse AI into every aspect of DJEH and take those learnings to drive change how communicators, communicate and drive thoughtful and smarter client engagements.

tools.title: ChatGPT 101: Introduction to ChatGPT
tools.description: In this course, you will learn how to use ChatGPT directly from the team at OpenAI to discover essential tips and tricks and what is covered in the ChatGPT Enterprise tool. You must complete the AI Compliance - DJEH mandatory training before beginning this course.

tools.title: ESG Insights Partner
tools.description: Advisory ESG (Environmental, Sustainability and Governance) insights for professionals in B2C consulting, strategy, and communications.

tools.title: Choosing the Right ChatGPT Model
tools.description: Comprehensive guide to selecting the appropriate ChatGPT model for different tasks, use cases, and performance requirements. Learn the differences between GPT-4, GPT-3.5, and specialized models.

tools.title: How to Create a Custom GPT
tools.description: Step-by-step guide to building your own custom GPT. Covers setup, configuration, training data, and best practices for creating specialized AI assistants.

tools.title: How to Organize Your Work with ChatGPT Projects
tools.description: Practical guide to structuring and managing your ChatGPT projects for maximum productivity. Learn project organization, workflow optimization, and collaboration best practices.

tools.title: Using ChatGPT - Sources, Research, and Disclosure
tools.description: Essential guide to responsible ChatGPT usage covering source verification, research methodology, and proper disclosure practices. Critical for maintaining credibility and ethical AI use.

metadata.source: CSV conversion + manual additions + PDF guides
